subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Stewart Cink and Scott Verplank will join Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Jim Furyk, Chad Campbell, David Toms, Chris DiMarco and four Ryder Cup rookies.
snippet: Stewart Cink and Scott Verplank will join Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Jim Furyk, Chad Campbell, David Toms, Chris DiMarco and four Ryder Cup rookies.
